instruction: In what ways has the Internet changed communication?
output: The Internet has changed communication in a variety of ways. It has made it easier to connect with people across the world through email, video calls, and social media platforms such as Facebook and Instagram. Additionally, the Internet has made information sharing much more convenient and accessible, with websites and search engines such as Google providing an immense amount of information within seconds. Finally, the Internet has made communication more instant, with text messages and instant messaging apps such as Whatsapp and Skype.
